title: Behold Esports recruiting for second roster for tournament's (Higher Silver - Gold) (Top, Mid, ADC)
body:
Looking to fill up spots in Behold Esports secondary team.

Must Have -
1. Clear Communication (No mic no play)
2. Ability to play a range of champions (OTP will easily get banned out)
3. Work well in a team environment

Experience in tournaments is helpful but not needed

Add me on League or Discord for more information
- ItsHavoc
- Havoc#4859

Cheers
